data.title: allesfitter: Flexible star and exoplanet inference from photometry and radial velocity
data.name: allesfitter
data.description: allesfitter is a convenient wrapper around the packages ellc (light curve and RV models), dynesty (static and dynamic nested sampling) emcee (Markov Chain Monte Carlo sampling) and celerite (Gaussian Process models).

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "keywords = {Exoplanets, Binary stars, Stellar flares, Bayesian statistics, Astronomy software, Starspots, Astronomy data modeling, 498, 154, 1603, 1900, 1855, 1572, 1859, Astrophysics - Earth and Plan"
“allesfitter … is a public and user-friendly astronomy software package for modeling photometric and RV data.”
“A graphical user interface allows to define all input. Then, allesfitter automatically runs a nested sampling or MCMC fit, and produces ascii tables, latex tables, and plots.”
